MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH47 and EH48 postcode area of Bathgate. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1am to carry out safe repair work on overhead line equipment near Blackburn and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:05am on 14th February 2021.
